title: FrenchAnalyzer should apply LowerCaseFilter before ElisionFilter
description: This was initially reported at https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/15774. Applying elisions before lowercasing means we might miss to remove some articles.

comments.author: Adrien Grand
comments.content: Nevermind FrenchAnalyzer is configured with a CharArraySet for articles that ignores the case.
